sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: An explosion partially collapses the bridge linking occupied Crimea with Russia, killing three people in the process.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Moscow has not yet apportioned blame.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin appointed a new overall commander for its military after Moscow suffered a series of military setbacks in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The German rail operator blamed cable sabotage for a major disruption across the north of the country on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The ministers of interior of the EU Med5 group call for more support from the bloc to frontline countries to deal with migration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A fire rages on the bridge linking Russia with the occupied Crimean Peninsula after a vehicle bomb caused the partial collapse of the vital link to the territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Moscow hasn't yet apportioned blame and Kyiv hasn't claimed responsibility for the attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Opened in 2018, the bridge is not just important for civilian logistics, but also to Moscow's troops fighting in the south of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Although Russian authorities decided not to suspend naval traffic under the bridge, a map online showed a large bottleneck building up.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The Russian-appointed head of Crimea assured the restoration works will start today and try to calm fears of supplies running low.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He said, I want to assure Crimeans that the fuel reserves are sufficient for a month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Food stocks are more than enough for two months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: There are no risks in this respect.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: I call on all of the inhabitants of Crimea to keep calm, all the tourists of the peninsula to be patient.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, in the center of Kyiv, an improvised postal stamp was quickly installed, celebrating the explosion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It's in a similar style to other stamps, such as the sinking of the Russian flagship, the Moskva.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: It was wonderful.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: When I woke up and read the news, I thought, what? I mean, I expected that something was going to happen because yesterday was Putin's birthday. He turned 17. So I was waiting for a present from the armed forces of Ukraine. And it happened with a bit of a delay, but that's life. I hope the dictator Putin can forgive us.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This is not just a strategic nightmare for Russia, but also a symbolic one.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The bridge was a very obvious sign of Russia's ambition to incorporate Ukrainian areas into its territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Russia has appointed a new commander to lead its troops in Ukraine after the Kremlin suffered a series of military setbacks in the past weeks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Sergei Surovikin, an army general, previously led Russian forces in Syria, and he is known for his brutal and sometimes controversial tactics.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This is the first time an official announcement has been made appointing a single overall commander since the start of the invasion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The change follows the reported sacking earlier this week of two Russian army commanders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russia has been concentrating its latest attacks in Ukraine on the southern city of Zaporizhia, home to Europe's largest nuclear power plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The UN atomic watchdog has renewed calls for a protection zone around the power plant, which lost its last external power source as a result of artillery fire and is now relying on emergency diesel generators.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: All six reactors are shut down, but they still require electricity for cooling and other essential safety functions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Residents in the recaptured Ukrainian city of Lehmann await the distribution of humanitarian aid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: It was only last week that it was liberated from four months of Russian occupation, and the authorities now have an enormous support task on their hands. It was only last week that it was liberated from four months of Russian occupation, and the authorities now have an enormous support task on their hands.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: You know, almost all the occupied settlements share the same problem, says this spokeswoman for the Donetsk regional administration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: They're completely destroyed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Infrastructure as well as the houses. And we can see what people need most is psychological support. The flag flies proudly at the entry of the city, but behind it are scenes of devastation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Tetiana is wearing recovered Russian army clothes because her own were destroyed when a rocket hit her house. I was at home when we were struck, she says.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: I fell into the bathroom and my daughter was in the hallway.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: How we weren't killed, I don't know.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Some Leiman residents express anger towards neighbors who supported the pro-Russian separatist movement before the war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Oleksandr is proud he held on to his Ukrainian flag.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I saved it, he says, because I was waiting for the Ukrainian army to come to liberate us from the Russian yoke.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The liberation may have come, but the reconstruction has only just begun.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: An act of sabotage disrupted train travel across northern Germany on Saturday morning.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: All high-speed regional and cargo trains in the north of the country were interrupted for nearly three hours due to radio link cables being cut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Police said the sabotage happened in a Berlin suburb and in Herna in the west.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The German rail operator said that the incident is currently under investigation, but there was no immediate information on potential suspects.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In addition to regional trains, some international routes were affected as well.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Trains from and to Berlin via Amsterdam were completely cancelled, while trains from Denmark weren't crossing the border into Germany.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: cancelled, while trains from Denmark weren't crossing the border into Germany. The ministers of the interior of Cyprus, Greece, Malta and Spain met in Paphos for the fourth

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: ministerial meeting of the Med5 group of countries, although the Italian minister did not attend.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The group called for more action to protect the EU's external borders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We call upon the Commission and the Council to finally acknowledge the increased duties assigned to frontline member states.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It is essential to provide for an effective, predictable and mandatory solidarity mechanism that reflects the need on the ground. The Med5 group also referenced the war in Ukraine and its effect on the global economy in making action even more urgent, fearful that migration will surge.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The impact of the war and the increasing prices of basic commodities have resulted in a new wave of economic migrants.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Sub-Saharan migrants who originally seek employment in Libya and turns to smugglers when things do not work out as planned.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: People are dying around us, a tragedy after another, from Lebanon to the Atlantic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: We, southern European countries, know that no system can ever work if the burden of responsibility continues to fall almost exclusively on the countries of the south have received significant funds to manage the large number of refugees and migrants they received.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Yet many believe that this money was given so that the south could be turned into a big prison where people arrive and get trapped.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Med5 argues that this is a common challenge and that all countries must take their responsibilities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: At least 10 people have died after a huge explosion at a petrol station in County Donegal

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: in the northwest of the Republic of Ireland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: A search operation is continuing as a number of people are still missing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Eight more people were also taken to a nearby hospital.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The explosion happened at an Apple Green service station in the village of Kreislau on Friday afternoon.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The blast destroyed the petrol station and a section of a nearby apartment building.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Many emergency service vehicles remained at the scene overnight, including fire service from both the Republic of Ireland and Northern Ireland, which is part of the UK.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: A Coast Guard helicopter airlifted some of those who were injured in the blast A Coast Guard helicopter airlifted some of those who were injured in the blast to be treated in Dublin Several thousand people took to the streets of Berlin this Saturday to protest against the government's energy policies

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The event was organized by the far-right AFD party in Germany in order to speak out against the soaring energy prices in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: In response to the AFD event, several counter demonstrations ran in parallel.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Thousands of people marched in Rome on Saturday. It's the powerful Italian trade union CGIL that organized the protest to commemorate one year since its headquarters were attacked by a mob of neo-fascists.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The Minister of Labor, Andrea Orlando, is expected to join the march.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: The organizers have also announced 10 key proposals they want to present to the newly elected center-right government.
